episodes.title: The Japanese Cult Iceberg Explained, Tier One! (1/8)
episodes.description:
#charliedogwood  #history #japan #japanesehistory 

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/MHgtgFcNAu

Welcome to Tier One of the Japanese Cult Iceberg explained. I guess you have to have that sort of thing on there to make sure you show up in the algorithm. I don't know. I'm trying my best here, man.

Today we're going to dive on in and start looking at cults in Japan...and also some just strange religions. Ranging from controlling groups like Soka Gakkai to dangerous ones like Shoko Asahara's Aum Shinrikyo, even funny ones like Happy Science. We cover them all and them some. 

I plan on making more of these, depending on the reception. Hopefully it's good.

A History Documentary in the Storyteller style by Charlie Dogwood, 2025

Chapters:
0:00 Intro
1:13 The Unification Church
16:06 Tenrikyo
22:49 Soka Gakkai
35:49 Aum Shinrikyo
41:52 Happy Science
53:58 Omoto
1:01:51 Outro

-MUSIC CREDITS-
Krishmeister - Dark Suspense

episodes.title: Japan's Most Dangerous Cult: Aum Shinrikyo (Full Documentary)
episodes.description:
#charliedogwood  #japanesehistory #japan #history  

Sorry for the reupload! I had to fix a few things!

In 1994 and 1995, the cult known as Aum Shinrikyo led by 'yoga guru' Asahara Shoko (known as Shoko Asahara in the West) launched a series of attacks in Japan, first starting with the Matsumoto Sarin Incident and then the Tokyo Subway Sarin Gas Attacks. It was an unprecedent series of attacks, utilizing poison gas to attack random people. 

For what reason, for what purpose? 

Here's the full story of Aum Shinrikyo and Asahara Shoko...

A History Documentary by Charlie Dogwood, 2024

I guess this counts as true crime? It's a cult so I guess it counts, right?
